SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (Version 4.10) Release Notes

Boost your storefront’s search engine optimization (SEO) ranking, deliver page content to your storefront users faster, and enjoy a more efficient admin experience. Trust the integrity of your B2B Commerce for Visualforce data, and get started with new storefronts more quickly.

Upgrade to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ‘19 (Version 4.10)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10) introduces changes that affect the Shopping Cart page and adds fixes for performance and security. These changes can disrupt your existing storefront after you upgrade the managed package. To resolve these changes in your B2B Commerce for Visualforce solution and keep your storefront working correctly, complete the following upgrade steps.
SEO: Provide More Storefront Data to External Search Engines
Attract more traffic by delivering higher-quality information to search engine bots that crawl your storefront pages. Boost your SEO ranking by eliminating potentially duplicated index results, improving link equity within your pages, and showing more content directly in Google results.
Shield Platform Encryption: Protect Your B2B Commerce for Visualforce Data
Trust the security of the data that users engage with on your storefront pages. B2B Commerce for Visualforce now uses Shield Platform Encryption to apply deterministic encryption to more than 50 fields on both standard and custom objects.
Shopping Cart Page 2.0: Easier Extension and Enhanced Performance
An updated version of the Shopping Cart page is available immediately after upgrade. With version 2.0, you can customize the Shopping Cart page business logic more easily, and your storefront users can enjoy a more responsive cart experience.
Storefront Experience: Learn and Customize B2B Commerce for Visualforce Faster
Learn B2B Commerce for Visualforce more quickly and completely, and start customizing your storefront experience in fewer steps. With a new demo storefront, new data sets, and new themes, it’s easier than ever to bring your storefront online.
Performance and Security: Help Users Browse Pages and Complete Tasks More Quickly and Confidently
Storefront users can enjoy better performance when browsing pages on your storefront.
Admin Experience: More Easily Manage Storefront Data in Your Org
Equip your admins with better tools for managing your org's B2B Commerce for Visualforce data. Simplify the process of setting up new storefronts and upgrading to new releases or patches. And, admins whose native language is Japanese can now enjoy a more efficient experience with a localized CC Admin.
Other Fixes in B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (Version 4.10)
Have confidence that the issues related to performance or buyer experience that you've reported are resolved appropriately. This release includes several fixes that resulted from your submitted cases.
Patch Notes for B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (Version 4.10)
Several patch releases are available for maintaining existing implementations of B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10). Some patches contain fixes that require manual upgrade steps. Each patch release is also cumulative, and contains all the fixes from previous B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10) patches. When you install a particular patch build, complete any required upgrade steps for all patches that precede the patch you're installing.

title: B2B Commerce Upgrade Guide
